title: SECLI TEAM SENDS CUSTOMER/ACCOUNT FTC FILE TO ENGINE COMMON FOR ENRICHMENT

task_list.instruction_title:
_- SECLI sends to Engine in an FTC file (CSV format) the following fields: - - Emetteur
- Garantie
- Compte
- Devise
- Montant_Gar


This is for **ENGINE SECRET** to enrich the file with the cash account details.

**FTC_SECLI_MOTEUR_0061_CREDITCARDS**
